page.title: 03RECREATION AROUND BALLATER
page.content: The recreational facilities are an outstanding feature of this area; alongside the natural beauty of mountains, birchwoods and moorland. In the summer months when the weather can often be warm and sunny, there are many sports and leisure pursuits to be followed:-including walking, climbing, cycling, fishing, golf, tennis. In Upper Deeside the winter can bring severe snowstorms and bitterly cold weather. The nearby ski slopes at Glenshee provides recreation during the winter months. A water-logged field at Eastfield of Monaltrie farm is used during freezing weather by the local curling league.
